# availableMediaCharacteristicsWithMediaSelectionOptions

**Instance Property**

An array of media characteristics for which a media selection option is available.

## Declaration

```swift
var availableMediaCharacteristicsWithMediaSelectionOptions: [AVMediaCharacteristic] { get }
```

## Accessing media selections

- **allMediaSelections**: The array of available media selections for this asset.
- **mediaSelectionGroup(forMediaCharacteristic:)**: Returns a media selection group that contains one or more options with the specified media characteristic.

items.description: The array of available media selections for this asset.
items.name: allMediaSelections

items.description: Returns a media selection group that contains one or more options with the specified media characteristic.
